name: Conquoror's Dream
description:
Conquoror's dream is a platformer versus game developed for the #UE4 summer jam 2019. The object of the game is to shoot your opponent with your arrows. But watch out, it takes a while to reload.

Controls:

WASD/Left Joystick = Movement

Space Bar/A button = Jump

G/X button = Shoot

P/Share button = Respawn

Esc/Menu button = Pause

P1 = Keyboard

P2 = Controller

I designed this game to use with an Xbox One controller, but others are also compatible.

Tileset from https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/medieval-pixel-art-asset-free/

Archer from https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/fantasy-heroes-character-sprite-sheet-10156/

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Sound effects obtained from https://www.freesound.org
